content: this pattern and video tutorial will show you how to make a volleyball crochet keychain it s the perfect quick gift for volleyball players or sports lovers **the pattern is free with ads on my website ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 400 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 ***you can also get this volleyball keychain pattern in an ebook with 8 additional crochet sports ball patterns right here 2 *** 1 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/ 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-sports-ball-keychains-made-easy/ ref=ravelry
